page.title: 03 Children's Games.
page.content: {SPIN THE BOTTLE_}you need a bottle and some people. Spin the bottle, When it stops, whoever the bottle is pointing to has to do a 'dare'. {RAINDROPS_}Pick a raindrop at the top of the window place a bet on it,your friend does the same.The person whose raindrop reaches the bottom first wins {SKIPPING_}Two people hold a rope,one at each end and swing it round fast. The others run in, jump over the rope as it comes round then run out without getting tangled. Anyone caught changes places with one of the people holding the end of the rope. {KING BALL-}A person is 'king'. He tries to hit the others with a ball below the knee.If that happens the person hit becomes one of the kings' helpers. It goes on until everyone is caught. The first person caught then becomes'king'.
